title: The Migrant experience. Parts 1-3
creator_credit: Film Australia, Malcolm Smith, Karl McPhee and Ben Lewin
brief_description: A series, made up of six episodes, that presents a comprehensive history of the role of migration in the development of Australia’s nationhood. Part One: Setting out - looks at the general history of migration to Australia over 200 years. Part Two: Of dreams and reasons - looks at the reasons why people left their homelands and came to Australia. Part Three: First encounters - looks at how they were received.
